section.name: Console
section.span: A simple GUI application that can be used to edit the configuration.
section.p: The console application provides a simple interface to browse the repository and edit its contents. Most of the configuration is accessible this way, see the Configuration Nodes page for more details on what can be found where.
The console can normally be found under http://localhost:8080/cms/console. It actually depends on your configuration. It might be http://localhost:8080/console.

The application is based on the concept of "the selected node". This is the JCR node that is selected in the tree. The main panel shows properties and node type information and allows you to edit those. The menu operations are also based on this node:

ol.li: Add Node: adds a child node
Add Property: add a property to the node
Save: save the node and its descendants
Reset: reset the node and its descendants
